name: SamuraiShopping
description:
A Game made for an Assignment at HKU.

Collect Red Food on your Katana for +1 score per second.

Collect Blue Food on your Katana for +2 score per second.

Collect Gold Food on your Katana for +3 score per second.

But be carefull not to get shot or keep the guards on your Katana for too long, being shot will remove 1 health, and keeping a guard on your Katana will subtract 2 points each second!!!
